pkgmetadata.longdescription: # apronpyPython Interface for the [APRON Numerical Abstract Domain Library](http://apron.cri.ensmp.fr/library/).## Getting Started ### Prerequisites* Install [**APRON**](https://github.com/antoinemine/apron)* Install [**Python 3.x**](http://www.python.org/)### Installation* Create a virtual Python environment: | Linux or Mac OS X | | ----------------------------------- | | `virtualenv --python=python3 <env>` |* Install apronpy in the virtual environment: | Linux or Mac OS X | | --------------------------------- | | `./<env>/bin/pip install apronpy` |
